title: In Regards to My 2nd Trip and My 7 Husbands - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Josei   Romance   Smut
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Caring Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Knights   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Polyandry   Reverse Harem   Transported to Another World
author: Hinoto   ひのと
description:
One year ago, I wandered into a different world. Instead of falling in love and making great memories, I found myself cooking, cleaning, and doing laundry for the students of Adergart knight academy.

Eventually, I somehow traveled back to my former world, however... one year later, I returned once again! 

What? 

Moreover, it looks like 10 years have passed here? And it seems that the birth rate for females decreased drastically, which led to the start of the multi-husband system?

Last year’s young boys who aren’t married yet, are now chasing after me.

A heartwarming love and inescapable reverse harem story.>
